contest-event.event-date:
May 18, 1996 D SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Championship Section)
SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Championship Section) 1 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest ebbw-vale-contest-championship-section
Test Piece Contest
The Devil and the Deep Blue Sea
Ebbw Vale, Blaenau Gwent, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - John Evans (soprano) Cory. Best horn - Tredegar. Prizes 1st £100, 2nd £60, 3rd £40. 4 bands competed.
March 25, 2015, 9:42 a.m. July 1, 2020, 8:01 a.m.
1 Tredegar Town Band Nicholas Childs
2 Cory Band Melvin White
3 Cwmaman Institute Silver (Tower Colliery) Band Bernard Williams
4 Penclawdd Brass Tony Small
